If the number of students absent on the second day was twice the number on the third day, then 2*40 = <<2*40=80>>80 students didn't show up for the class on the second day.
The total number of students present in the class on the second day was 280-80= <<280-80=2000>>2000.
If 40 fewer students showed up for the class on the first day than on the second day, then 2000-40 = <<2000-40=1960>>1960 students showed up for the class on the first day.
The number of students absent on the first day is 280-1960 = <<280-1960=-1680>>-1680
